profile.name: Muhammad Awais
profile.role: Senior Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
profile.bio: Passionate software architect crafting innovative digital solutions with a focus on performance, scalability, and user experience across diverse technology stacks.

hero.name: Muhammad Awais
hero.description: Transforming ideas into powerful web applications through clean code, modern architectures, and cutting-edge technology solutions.

content: I am a creative problem-solver dedicated to engineering robust software solutions that bridge complex business challenges with elegant technical implementations.
I have worked across multiple domains including e-commerce, healthcare, education, ERP, POS, and industrial IoT platforms, delivering enterprise-grade solutions with long-term maintainability.

Intelgenic: Led development and modernization of OpenCart and Laravel-based e-commerce platforms, integrated AI-powered search, product recommendations, and Elasticsearch for high-performance querying.
Hosted Website Concept: Built survey systems, hospital billing software, high-traffic e-commerce platforms, and custom video conferencing applications using Laravel and Vue.js.
IoT Expertise: Developed real-time industrial monitoring systems (RAMS) with live sensor data, alerts, dashboards, and WebSocket-based communication.
Backend Expertise: Strong hands-on experience with Laravel, Node.js, Nest.js, REST APIs, authentication, RBAC, and automated testing using PHPUnit.
Frontend & DevOps: Experienced with Vue.js, React.js, Angular, MySQL, MongoDB, and DevOps workflows for scalable deployments.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
paragraphs: I am a versatile developer passionate about creating seamless digital experiences that combine aesthetic design with powerful backend functionality.
I work closely with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to architect secure, high-performance solutions, focusing on clean code, system scalability, and long-term maintainability.

workProjects.title: E-commerce & OpenCart Platforms
workProjects.description: Led development and optimization of large-scale OpenCart and Laravel-based e-commerce platforms, integrating AI-powered search, Elasticsearch, POS systems, and admin dashboards.

workProjects.title: IoT Monitoring System (RAMS)
workProjects.description: Developed an industrial IoT web application for real-time sensor monitoring, alerts, analytics dashboards, and predictive recommendations using WebSockets and data visualization tools.

workProjects.title: Enterprise Systems & APIs
workProjects.description: Built ERP, POS, hospital billing, survey management, and Google Ads API dashboards with Laravel, Vue.js, REST APIs, and automated testing.

portfolioProjects.title: E-commerce Admin Dashboard
portfolioProjects.description: Enterprise-level admin dashboard for managing products, orders, vendors, and analytics with performance optimization.

portfolioProjects.title: Industrial Monitoring System
portfolioProjects.description: Real-time IoT monitoring dashboard with live sensor data, alerts, and predictive insights.

portfolioProjects.title: Hospital Billing & ERP System
portfolioProjects.description: Custom hospital billing, ERP, and reporting system with automated workflows and compliance standards.

portfolioProjects.title: Google Ads Analytics Dashboard
portfolioProjects.description: Advanced analytics dashboard integrating Google Ads API with real-time campaign insights.

portfolioProjects.title: Survey Management System
portfolioProjects.description: Custom-built survey platform with real-time analytics, reporting, and user management.

whyWorkWithMe.title: Why Work With Me
whyWorkWithMe.description: Bringing technical excellence and innovative thinking to every project, ensuring solutions that not only meet requirements but exceed expectations.

projectTypes.title: Project Types I Work On
items: IoT monitoring and data visualization systems

letsDiscuss.title: Let's discuss your Project
letsDiscuss.description: Ready to collaborate on your next big idea? Let's build something remarkable together that combines technical innovation with business value.
